On 12/22/2020 at 1:06 PM, sharkrider2187 said:

On specific parts, actually all of them, they are not placing on the craft, then i have to close the game, and lose my craft.

This has happened to me when I have made extremely large craft (+500 parts and way above). I am assuming you are experiencing this issue in the PC version of the game and I will focus my observations on that version. There are a few other things which can cause this issue to happen:

  • You are maxing out your system's memory and it is using virtual ram (on Win10 machines). This slows down the game to a crawl at times.
  • You are using a lot of memory intensive mods, which ^^^
  • You are using an out of date or messed up mod that's throwing errors whenever you try to place it in the craft editor.

The best way to do is to periodically save your design progress as you build your craft. This way, if the game does go wonky, you at least have some progress saved. And unless it causes the game to freeze, simply exit the craft editor and then go back into the editor and reload the saved craft file. It should take you back to the last time you saved it and still be able to continue developing the craft.
